properties.description:
We'll always run as incremental.

- Pamameters:
["{'schema': 'SCAE', 'table':'HISTORICO_VINCULO','load_type':'incremental','partition_column':'null', 'control_column':'DATA_ALTERACAO', 'control_column_type_2_db':'datetime', 'control_column_default_value': '19000101000000', 'control_column_mask_value': 'DD/MM/YYHH24:MI:SSFF', 'columns': 'COD_HISTORICO_VINCULO,DATA_ALTERACAO,COD_MATRICULA,COD_VINCULO,COD_PESSOA', 'raw': {'partition_by': [{'col_name': 'YEAR', 'implementation': 'df.withColumn(\\'YEAR\\', functions.year(functions.col(\\'DATA_ALTERACAO\\')))'}, {'col_name': 'MONTH', 'implementation': 'df.withColumn(\\'MONTH\\', functions.month(functions.col(\\'DATA_ALTERACAO\\')))'}]}}"]

This objetc is ~1600MB in size. You can user coalesce(14) for partitions to be about 128MB in size.
